long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,:
Re-enable Right Click for Web Developer™

Unblocks right click menu, highlight and copy for all pages
Unblock Context Menu and Select, Allow selecting, Allow copying, Allow right clicking in some restricted pages.

Has the right click button on a website ever been disabled for you? By installing this software extension, you can always ensure the right click mouse button works for any website. This software extension works well for the Google Chrome browser.


Installing this free extension enables you to cut, copy, and paste via right-click menus and the ribbon toolbar when using Office on the web.
Due to limitations of web browsers, copying and pasting in Microsoft Office for the web through menus requires additional permissions which are provided through this extension.

Our extension helps you re-enable and allow right click function on every websites that block the right-click menu.

To begin using the software, just click on the extension icon if the right click button is disabled for any website. Our extension will reload the Web page you are on and allow you to use the right click button once again.

Disclaimer: Please note this extension is NOT made by Google and is made by an independent development team. All copyrights belong to their respective owners. Google doesn’t endorse or sponsor this Chrome extension. Enable Right Click for Web Developer™ is not owned by, is not licensed by and is not a subsidiary of Google Inc.

Note: to report bugs, please use the Extension's homepage and fill the bug report form: www.codehemu.com
